short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An intuitive popup calendar extension that displays public holidays for the selected country.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thanks for checking out my chrome extension! If you have any issues please feel free to contact me with details. If you enjoy it also please leave a review! Keep an eye out for ongoing development and improvements.
